author: cnbc.com
title: MannKind reports 4Q loss
text:
WESTLAKE VILLAGE, Calif. (AP) _ MannKind Corp. (MNKD) on Tuesday reported a fourth-quarter loss of $32.8 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier.
On a per-share basis, the Westlake Village, California-based company said it had a loss of 28 cents.
The biopharmaceutical company posted revenue of $4.5 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported a loss of $117.3 million, or $1.13 per share, swinging to a loss in the period. Revenue was reported as $11.7 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the company's shares hit $3.15. A year ago, they were trading at $2.61.
